attributes.action:
Ban fireworks. 
The stress caused to vulnerable people and animals
attributes.additional_details:
This is an outdated “celebration”
Surely this was an act of terrorism?
So many vulnerable people live in fear.
The fireworks are getting louder each year!
The elderly and the infirm who live alone, dread this time of year.
Pet owners are heartbroken seeing their pets absolutely terrified.
Fire Service personnel deserve to be treated with respect, not having bricks, stones and fireworks thrown at them with a barrage of foul language. Can the government not see the suffering. Mmm maybe that’s a silly ??
attributes.background:
PTSD, mainly suffered by former military personnel.
Fighting the battles the government send them into.
Surely they need some consideration and compassion.
Stopping loud fireworks would go a long way in to assuring sufferers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626850
